If you enjoyed playing Friday the 13th, you'll definitely enjoy Dead by Daylight. It's a great game to play with a group of friends if you can handle survival horror gameplays.
O jogo é muito bom, tem um contexto legal, bastante dlc pagas o q na minha opinião não deverião ser tao caras. Se torna bem enjoativo com o passar do tempo por ser sempre a mesma coisa.
Broken as all heck, but also fun as all heck when it's working. I'd say more but I'm too busy being murdered by Michael Myer--HFYAYSDH
Está 9/10 Le faltaria mas asesinos y estaría mejor.
O jogo é mt bom, a comunidade é bem tóxica, mas no geral é bem bom
It will go down as one of the games in history
Con 360 horas y sumando puedo decir que Dead By Daylight para mi gusto es un juegazo y aunque te enojes por los tuneleros o camperos te divierte mucho y más si lo jugás con amigos

Здравствуйте, тут нету настройки яркости, досвидания.
Спасибо за прекрасную карту "Поместье Ямаоки", на которой ничего не видно абсолютно, бегать за красными линиями которые резко обрываются очень интересно.

p.s. задание в архивах просто КоН ЧеН  НЫе. Передаю привет заданию "обыскать 12 сундуков". И Мэг которая не дает мне это сделать. Самое смешное что это абсолютно разные игроки
Um jogo incrivel, perfeito, com alguns bugs mas poucos, faz voce jogar por horas, simplismente perfeito
desde que salio para mi fue un juego demasiado entretenido, tanto sobrevivir como ser el asesino, jugar con amigos le da un plus, sus mapas, personajes y objetos para mi son muy buenos
Para juegar con amigos es bastante bueno y para unos sustos
Great sound quality, heart bumping love it, it will jump you off chair

I'm a really casual player, so it's still kind of a horror game for me when playing as a survivor. It's also fun to be the killer, chasing people and watching them struggle (unless they know how to play the game)

I have played over 600 hours of this shit game and have realized one thing, this game is shit and the devs don't care one single bit. It is honestly shocking that this game has survived as long as it has, there has been bug after bug and nothing gets fixed. At this point it isn't that there a few bugs that can be fixed with the next chapter, it's that the game is, at its core, broken. Hitboxes are a joke, I have over 100 clips that show how broken the hitboxes are. Getting hit through windows when you're already running after vaulting through the window is a joke. Dedicated servers made killer lung ranges 50 feet longer and it's absurd that the devs allow this to happen and are doing absolutely nothing about it. The same goes for getting hit through pallet drops as well. If the I get the killer stun while he is in lung animation and 10 feet away from me then I shouldn't get hit. The devs actually don't know how to code their game because they have actual brain damage. This game is so fucking broken and the devs don't care one bit to fix it. They will not do a quality of life update to fix the game and instead pump out more content that is even more broken than the last. Hey devs, stop fucking around and making players of your game suffer and fix the fucking game. You all are worthless and have no clue how to actually run a company or manage a game. You are all fucking worthless.
its a fun game to play with friends
Może i gra jest fajna, ale niestety toksyczna społeczność wszytko psuje. Zachowania niektórych graczy i komentarze na końcu gry wołają o pomstę do nieba

非常に人を選ぶゲームであり、自分としてはイマイチ他人に勧められるほど面白いとは思えなかったです。
低価格ゲームだから試しに買うことに抵抗がない人はとりあえず買ってみてもいいのではないでしょうか。

ルール自体が面白くホラーゲームとしての側面もよく出ていてある程度は楽しめます。
ですが、最終的に飽きが来るか沼にはまるかは好みに寄りすぎるかと思います。

自分は全体的に操作性の悪さでバランスを取ろうとしている節に苛立ちを覚えてしまい、特にその傾向の強いキラー側では特にストレスがたまってしまいました。
また、操作性を抜きにしてもゲームバランスが良いとはいえず、PvPを楽しむゲームとしては他に面白いゲームがたくさんあると感じてしまいます。
キャラクター育成を促進させる要素も特になく、しかもランクシステムが息をしていないようなので後発組や時々しかプレイしない人が不利なのもつらいです。

不具合も非常に多く、ミッション進行が出来ないバグ、回復を行えないバグ、切断バグなどゲームに重大な支障をきたすバグによく出会うのも欠点です。
特に、正規購入したにもかかわらず不正アクセスを疑われ、数試合するたびに全消去再インストールをするのを夏に３回ほど繰り返したのが一番印象強いです。当然ですがMODやチートは使用していません。

開発者の発言なども見ても今後改善はされないと思うので、多くある不快になる要素が目につかない・目をつむれる人にお勧めします。

追記：身内で固めて遊ぶ分には悪くないゲームです、全スキル解放のおかげでやりたいことがしやすいうえマナー問題も解決するのでぐっとやりやすくなります。

再追記：本日ゲームファイルの整合性不適で初めてゲーム中に落とされました。が、前述のとおり一切の改造・MODは使用していません。steamでの整合性チェックでは問題が発生していないうえ、問い合わせても具体的な改善内容を教えていただけないのに理不尽を突き付けられ大変腹を立てています。
Achei um passatempo bem bacana, especialmente quando se começa a jogar que todo killer é ainda mais aterrorizante.

Buy game! Then buy VPN bc devs dont want to fix their server code and shit tones of other bugs from 2016 (i chaned my steam region, opened some ports, but only VPN let you play as Killer)!

The list of problems that were not fixed since 2016:
-You may stuck inside another victim and will be unable to move
-You may fall under terrarian.
-You cant heal guys on stairs or hills
-Terrible server code (hits count on killer client side. MEME)
-Terrible controls and some map bugs.
-Impossible to block healing, retarded teammates will heal you in killer sight (equals death, you cant move while healing)
-Insane amount of server lags, every 2-3 game you need to reconnect to server.
Most of this bugs are so easy to fix, it take like 10 lines of code but no. 4 years not enough to fix it.

TRAPDOOR - ONLY ONE WAY TO WIN AS VICTIM, OTHER JUST DOESNT WORK BECAUSE OF ABSOLUTELY INSANE UNBALANCED SKILLS. for ex. skill that just block gen repair untill you found and destroy totem (which may dont spawn of course), whole team may die while trying to find this totem. Or skill that just blocks any healing and peaking up teammates. Or shit tone of other wallhack skills.
Killer is always faster then victim, got insane attack rage - 4 meters! He can attack throught walls, windows, pallets.
NO MATTER HOW YOU TRY, NO MATTER HOW GOOD IS YOUR TEAMMATES. NOTHING! NoThInG you can do in this game. I AM 100% EVEN DISCORD PARTY OF 4 WALLHACKERS CANT HAVE EVEN 80% WINRATE. Of course you should not survive evty game, but how about every 4?

WHY I SHOULD ALWAYS BE TENSE AND FOCUSED. WHY I SHOULD FLOOD MY SPACE BAR OR A, D KEYS LIKE INSANE? WHATS THE POINT?! THERE IS NO DIFFERECE HOW FAST ARE YOU CLICKING IT, YOU JUST NEED TO PRESS BUTTON LIKE 3 TIME PER SECOND SO GAME WILL UNDERSTAND YOU ARE NOT GIVING UP. I BROKE MY SPACEBAR. THATS THE GOAL? WHY SHOULD I LIKE TO PRESS SPACEBAR, WHY SHOULD I LIKE TO PRESS SPACEBAR IN TIME TO JUST PLAY THE GAME. WHY I CANT JUST HOLD IT? HOW SOMEONE CAN ENJOY THIS. CAN SOMEONE EXPLAIN?

P.S Game is great but why devs cant fix all of this

if you wanna play as a survivor then this game is GARBAGE and if you intend to play killer everytime then you should buy it... because there are 
 killer perks that show your EXACT LOCATION TO THE KILLER. IF you get out of a LOCKER, IF you are HEALING YOURSELF UP, IF you blow up a GENERATOR, IF you are WORKING ON A HEX TOTEM and IF one of your survivor friends get HANGED on a hook. the ones i mentioned in capital letters are the main point that why you play as survivor so you are going to be found by the killer anyways. you are going to play this game to get killed everytime. only in 1 game out of 10 maybe you have a chance to escape. I'm playing with a friend and I have only a couple of times enjoyed playing because we both survived and that's just a rare occasion. killers have all the best, useful, fun perks though survivors get a nice perk with an update then tomorrow it gets nerfed.
